items.name: Replica Siegebreaker
explicitMods: 10% increased maximum Energy Shield
10% increased maximum Life
+24% to Fire Resistance
Your Minions spread Burning Ground on Death, dealing 24% of their maximum Life as Fire Damage per second
Minions have 5% chance to Maim Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: "Recommend extreme caution on any prototypes that can lead to a chain reaction
of deaths. Lab Twelve has been lost to the flames."

items.typeLine: Enduring Divine Mana Flask of Damping
explicitMods: 66% reduced Amount Recovered

Effect is not removed when Unreserved Mana is Filled
Effect does not Queue

Grants Immunity to Ignite for 8 seconds if used while Ignited
Removes all Burning when used
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.typeLine: Masochist's Quicksilver Flask of the Opossum
explicitMods: Gain 2 Charges when you are Hit by an Enemy
37% less Duration
Immunity to Poison during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.typeLine: Simmering Divine Life Flask of Bounty
explicitMods: 53% reduced Amount Recovered
135% increased Recovery rate
50% of Recovery applied Instantly
Recover an additional 27% of Flask's Life Recovery Amount over 10 seconds if used while not on Full Life
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Severed in Sleep
explicitMods: Grants Level 25 Envy Skill
Minions have +29% to Chaos Resistance
Minions have 60% chance to inflict Withered on Hit
Minions have +5% to Critical Strike Multiplier per Withered Debuff on Enemy
flavourText: but we must crawl on our own.
<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Chayula}

items.typeLine: Bottomless Quartz Flask of the Carp
explicitMods: 45% increased Charge Recovery
44% chance to Avoid being Ignited during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Gloom Bead
explicitMods: 6% chance to receive additional Essences when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
2% chance in Heists for Items to drop fully linked
3% chance in Heists for Items to drop with an additional Socket
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this

items.name: Tavukai
explicitMods: +38 to Intelligence
Minions have -12% to Chaos Resistance
Summon Raging Spirit has 26% increased Duration
Summoned Raging Spirits deal 40% increased Damage
Summoned Raging Spirits have 48% increased maximum Life
Summoned Raging Spirits take 20% of their Maximum Life per second as Chaos Damage
flavourText: "Hyrri and her arrows broke the sacred code, damning herself.
Kaom seized her sacrifice, and in doing so, seized victory."

items.name: Rumi's Concoction
explicitMods: +12% Chance to Block Attack Damage during Effect
+6% Chance to Block Spell Damage during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world.
Today I am wise, so I am changing myself."

items.name: Light of Lunaris
explicitMods: Adds 37 to 60 Cold Damage to Spells
77% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
572% increased Energy Shield
+9% Chance to Block
+1% to Critical Strike Multiplier per 1% Chance to Block Attack Damage
+25% to Critical Strike Multiplier if you've dealt a Non-Critical Strike Recently
flavourText: Without night, there can be no day.
